__TOC__

Welcome to the MOTU uncommon programming languages team page. Come to #ubuntu-motu if you want to help out.

=== About ===

The scope of the this team is to cover packages which use uncommon programming languages and are not covered by another team.
Apart from caring for the actual packages, this page intends to list documentation resources on various uncommon programming languages.
